string.name: addItem
string.tiptext: Appends a new item at the end of the menu.

string.name: addItemAt
string.tiptext: Adds a new item at a specific position in the menu.

string.name: changeMenu
string.tiptext: Changes the menu.

string.name: collapseAll
string.tiptext: Collapses the menu.

string.name: editItemAt
string.tiptext: Edits the info for a specific item

string.name: getCheckBoxState
string.tiptext: Gets the current state of an item checkbox

string.name: getEnabled
string.tiptext: Method; returns a boolean; specifying whether the item specified in the parameters is enabled or disabled.

string.name: getParentPressedLabel
string.tiptext: Method; returns the text label of the parent item of the last pressed item.

string.name: getPressedIdx
string.tiptext: Method; returns the index of the last pressed item.

string.name: getPressedLabel
string.tiptext: Method; returns the text label of the last pressed item.

string.name: getRadioActiveItemIndex
string.tiptext: Method; returns the index number of the selected item in the radiogroup radioGroupName.

string.name: getRadioActiveItemData
string.tiptext: Method; returns the 'data' object of the selected item in the radiogroup 'radioGroupName'.

string.name: getParentItem
string.tiptext: Method; returns the 'data' object of the parent item of the item specified in the parameters.

string.name: getChildItems
string.tiptext: Method; returns an array with all the 'data' objects of child items of the item specified in the parameters.

string.name: refresh
string.tiptext: Rebuilds the menu.

string.name: removeItemAt
string.tiptext: Method; removes an item.

string.name: setCheckBoxState
string.tiptext: Method; sets the state of a checkbox menu item.

string.name: setEnabled
string.tiptext: Method; enables and disables menu items

string.name: setRadioActiveItem
string.tiptext: Method; sets the selected item in the radiogroup specified by radioGroupName.

string.name: onBeginLoad
string.tiptext: Callback invoked just before the menu is created.

string.name: onFinishLoad
string.tiptext: Callback invoked just after the menu is created.

string.name: onPressItem
string.tiptext: Callback invoked when an menu item is pressed.

string.name: onReleaseItem
string.tiptext: Callback invoked when an menu item is released.

string.name: onRollOutItem
string.tiptext: Callback invoked when an menu item is rolled out by the mouse.

string.name: onRollOverItem
string.tiptext: Callback invoked when an menu item is rolled over by the mouse.
